mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM, NO, NAME, CONTENT, SUBJECT, DATE FROM BOARD, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET NAME = #{name}, SUBJECT = #{subject}, CONTENT = #{content}, DATE = NOW() WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE NO IN (#{checkno})
